gui.mob_pets.mp_main.label_tame_capacity: Tame Capacity is the max hp
advancements.creature_attack.descr: Order your mob to attack a creature
item.altarsnote.desc: The altar can be used to tame creatures with higher health limits. You need to synthesize a Conquer Altar. Place the altar on the ground and activate it using a Nether Star. When there is an activated altar within 8 squares, R+Right Click a creature begins to tame. If the creature leaves the range of the altar during domestication, it needs to be re tamed. When taming, it will continue to consume experience. Creatures with higher health value will tame for longer and consume more experience. You can accelerate domestication by hitting the creature to the point of residual blood. You can synthesize Magic Altar or Life Altar, which can reduce experience consumption and tame time respectively, but also require specific bases.
item.mob_pets.pets_collecter.decr1: Teleport your servants to your position.
block.magicaltar.desc: A 3x3 square needs to be placed with 9 lapis lazuli blocks at the bottom to achieve the effect of reducing experience consumption
